entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
